title: BISACs vs Amazon Categories - I Can't Find the Category I Want!
description:
BISACs, what are they? 

Have you ever wondered why when uploading your new book that you are only able to choose from a few thousand categories when Amazon has over 12,000? 

Well, those few categories that you see on your Author Page are called BISACs and they are the universal categories for bookstore everywhere. So, if you are wanting to learn more about BISACs and what to know how you can still get your book under the categories you want, watch this video and I will show you how!

How to rank under 10 categories for your book, not just 2: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2GO-XNA0epE&t=2s

Also, be sure to check out my almighty master guide to Amazon Categories: https://kindlepreneur.com/how-to-choose-the-best-kindle-ebook-kdp-category/
